total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern in the transformation of the input grid to the output grid in the examples.

Q2: Notice that the colors of the cells in the input grid are swapped in the output grid. For example, in Example 1, the cells with color 8 are changed to color 4 and vice versa. Similarly, the cells with color 3 are changed to color 2 and vice versa.
Q3: Apply the same pattern to the quiz input grid. Identify the cells with color 3 and color 2, and swap their colors.
Q4: Similarly, identify the cells with color 6 and color 1, and swap their colors.
